title: Definitive orange cake
description: Zest up your baking with this super-easy orange cake. It's perfect for Mother's Day.Equipment and preparation: You will need two loose-bottomed 20cm/8in sandwich tins, 4cm/1½in deep.
ingredients: 225g/8oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
1 orange, finely grated zest and 2 tbsp juice
